abstract.t: This memo presents the definition of cyberspace resource, and then discusses a classification framework for cyberspace resources. Cyberspace is widely applied in people's daily life and it is regarded as a new space, paralleled to the geographic space. There are various resources in cyberspace. However, they have not been systematically defined and classified. The objective of this draft is to present the deifinition of cyberspace resource and a standard classification framework, thus, supporting the unified resource storage and shares.
